verses.verse: <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H2388>place,<s%> and strengthened himself against <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He <S%H5414>placed<s%> <S%H2428>forces<s%> in all the <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H5333>garrisons<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> which <S%H609>Asa<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H3920>taken.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was with <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> because he <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H1875>didn't<s%> seek the <S%H1168>Baals,<s%>
but <S%H1875>sought<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H1980>walked<s%> in his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and not after the <S%H4639>doings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5414>brought<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H4503>tribute;<s%> and he had <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honor<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance.<s%>

His <S%H3820>heart<s%> was lifted <S%H1361>up<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and furthermore he took <S%H5493>away<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> and the <S%H842>Asherim<s%> out of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

Also in the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> even Ben <S%H1134>Hail,<s%> and <S%H5662>Obadiah,<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> and <S%H5417>Nethanel,<s%> and <S%H4322>Micaiah,<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%>

and with them the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> even <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> and <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and <S%H2069>Zebadiah,<s%> and <S%H6214>Asahel,<s%> and <S%H8070>Shemiramoth,<s%> and <S%H3083>Jehonathan,<s%> and <S%H138>Adonijah,<s%> and <S%H2900>Tobijah,<s%> and <S%H2899>Tobadonijah,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites;<s%> and with them <S%H476>Elishama<s%> and <S%H3088>Jehoram,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests.<s%>

They <S%H3925>taught<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> having the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with <S%H5437>them;<s%> and they went about throughout all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3925>taught<s%> among the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

The <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> fell on all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%> that were <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> so that they made no <S%H3898>war<s%> against <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat.<s%>

Some of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H4503>presents,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> for <S%H4503>tribute;<s%> the <S%H6163>Arabians<s%> also <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> male <S%H8495>goats.<s%>

He had <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4399>works<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> mighty <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

This was the <S%H6486>numbering<s%> of them according to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses:<s%> Of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands:<s%> <S%H5734>Adnah<s%> the <S%H8269>captain,<s%> and with him mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand;<s%>
and <S%H3027>next<s%> to him <S%H3076>Jehohanan<s%> the <S%H8269>captain,<s%> and with him two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H505>thousand;<s%>

and <S%H3027>next<s%> to him <S%H6007>Amasiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri,<s%> who willingly <S%H5068>offered<s%> himself to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and with him two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor.<s%>

Of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> <S%H450>Eliada<s%> a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and with him two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5401>armed<s%> with <S%H7198>bow<s%> and <S%H4043>shield;<s%>
and <S%H3027>next<s%> to him <S%H3075>Jehozabad<s%> and with him one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> ready <S%H2502>prepared<s%> for <S%H6635>war.<s%>

These were those who <S%H8334>waited<s%> on the <S%H4428>king,<s%> besides those whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> throughout all <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
